INDEMNIFICATION

You will defend Keybase against any cost, loss, damage, or other liability arising from any third party demand or claim that any Your Content, or your use of the Service, in breach of these Terms: (a) infringes a registered patent, registered trademark, or copyright of a third party, or misappropriates a trade secret (to the extent that such misappropriation is not the result of Keybaseâ€™s actions). or (b) violates applicable law or these Terms. Keybase will reasonably notify you of any such claim or demand that is subject to your indemnification obligation.
title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service
